IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: ENHANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION FOR OSCEOLA COUNTY SCHOOLS
IRS990.MissionDesc: ENHANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION FOR OSCEOLA COUNTY SCHOOLS
IRS990.Desc: CHARTER SCHOOLS: TO PROVIDE MORE CLASSROOMS FOR OSCEOLA COUNTY, AND TO PROMOTE A HIGH STANDARD OF EDUCATION FOR OSCEOLA COUNTY. THE EDUCATION FOUNDATION'S FAMILY OF CHARTER ACADEMIES CONSISTS OF TWO CHARTER SCHOOLS, BELLALAGO ACADEMY, AND P.M. WELLS CHARTER ACADEMY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SCHOLARSHIP COUNSELING: THE FOUNDATION OFFERS FREE SCHOLARSHIP COUNSELING TO HIGH SCHOOL SENIORS AND JUNIORS, RESULTING IN 450 SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED TO GRADUATING SENIORS IN OSCEOLA COUNTY THIS YEAR.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: A GIFT FOR TEACHING: A FREE STORE FOR TEACHERS TO SHOP FOR SUPPLIES TO BE GIVEN TO NEEDY CHILDREN IN THEIR CLASSROOMS. THE MISSION IS TO ENSURE THAT CHILDREN AND CLASSROOMS IN THE COMMUNITY HAVE THE BASIC TOOLS FOR LEARNING.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES INCLUDE: -TAKE STOCK IN CHILDREN -BOOKMARK BUDDIES -MEDICAL PIPELINE -CONSTRUCTION PIPELINE -ENHANCEMENT GRANTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 2D
SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XII, LINE 2D

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION PUBLICIZES ITS RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY THROUGH NEWSPAPER.

REVENUES FOR CURRENT OPERATIONS ARE RECEIVED PRIMARILY FROM THE STATE OF FLORIDA PASSED THROUGH THE DISTRICT PURSUANT TO THE FUNDING PROVISIONS INCLUDED IN THE FOUNDATION'S CHARTER AGREEMENT WITH THE DISTRICT. THE FOUNDATION ALSO RECEIVES FEDERAL AWARDS FOR THE ENHANCEMENT OF VARIOUS EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS. THIS ASSISTANCE IS GENERALLY BASED ON APPLICATIONS SUBMITTED TO AND APPROVED BY VARIOUS GRANTING AGENCIES.
INDUSTRIAL DEV. REV. REFUNDING BOND CONSTRUCTION
OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES INCLUDE: -TAKE STOCK IN CHILDREN -BOOKMARK BUDDIES -MEDICAL PIPELINE -CONSTRUCTION PIPELINE -ENHANCEMENT GRANTS
THE ORGANIZAION UTILIZED CHARTER MANAGEMENT COMPANY FOR SCHOOL MANAGEMENT
THE FORM 990 WILL BE REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND THEN PRESENTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW AND FINAL APPROVAL.
VARIOUS COMMITTEES OF THE FOUNDATION FOR OSCEOLA MONITOR POTENTIAL CONFLICTS. BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO PROVIDE ANNUAL DISCLOSURES TO THE ORGANIZATION.
THE FOUNDATION OF OSCEOLA REQUIRES BOARD REVIEW AND APPROVAL FOR COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE ORGANIZATION.
THE FOUNDATION OF OSCEOLA REQUIRES BOARD REVIEW AND APPROVAL FOR COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT OF THE ORGANIZATION.
THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
